features: 【Sturdy and Durable】: All-metal casing is made of premium zinc alloy, which makes the usb c drive extremely sturdy and durable. USB C memory stick allow for the fast transfer and storage of files. The metal housing provides a more shockproof and heat dissipation to better protect important files

【360°Rotating Design】: The usbc flash drive with the innovative 360° swivel design to protect connectors, and 90 °stuck point design avoids the drive rotates randomly. Convenient keyring hole design, you can hang the usb memory stick on a key chain.

【USB C and USB A flash drive】: Seamlessly move content between 2-in-1 type c flash drive with usb c and usb a connectors. The usb c thumb drive allows you transfer data between smartphone/tablet and computer more conveniently. Free up space on your USB Type-C device.

【Faster transfer speed】: Flash drive reads at 40-80MB/s. Write speed 30-60MB/s. Dual connector flash drives make it easier for you to transfer data between your smartphone/tablet and your computer. Immediately free up space or quickly move pictures or movies on the device. The preferred flash drive for Android phones.

【Easy to Use】:Plug and play, no need for extra software. Fully compatible with Windows, MAC, Android, and Linux systems, this USB Type C memory stick would automatically back up your music, videos, movies, photos and files.
body.description: The USB C flash drive can be used to transfer photos and videos at high speed and for file backup. USB flash drives are commonly used in various Android smartphones and tablets, iPad Pro and iPad Mini using USB-c port, as well as PCs and laptops. Using it, you can make photo sharing and file transfer between these devices very simple and fast. Precautions: The initial storage format of this USB C thumb drive is exFAT. If there is incompatibility on the mobile phone, you need to reformat it to FAT32 format. However, FAT32 format cannot store a single video or file with a capacity greater than 4GB. The capacity calculation method of the computer is different from that of the USB drive. The computer uses 1MB = 1024KB and the USB drive uses 1MB = 1000KB. Therefore, the display capacity of the USB drive on the computer is about 92% of the marked capacity. USB flash drive will generate heat when working. This is a normal phenomenon. Please rest assured to use it. Media Formats Supported： Music: M4A / AIFF / CAF / MP3 / WAV Image: GIF / JPG / PNG / JPEG Video: AVI / FLV / M4V / MKV / MOV / MP4 / RMVB Document: DOC / PPT / XLS / XLSX / PDF / HTML / TX Compatible Devices: - iPad Pro2019/2020 (under iPad OS system, the USB is in ""File Folder"")/iPad Air 2020 - MacBook/MacBook Pro/Macbook Air - All Android smartphones and reading devices NOTE: After some brands of Android phones are used, when they are used in Windows, the Windows system will prompt "Repair". Please do not click "Repair" unless Windows cannot read the flash drive. Please do not reformat the flash drive by yourself. The formatting tool provided by Windows will damage it. You can contact us and we will give you new substitutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought to free up phone memory if pictures
reviews.reviewText: The new phone allows you to move the pictures to PC THEY found the information of how on internet. It worked so returned unopened with explanation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars probably a fraud
reviews.reviewText: Baught two of these devices and both behave in the same way. As best as I can determine this device is most likely a fraud. It tells the computer that it has 1TB of storage yet its storage capacity is much smaller. If you try to store more than about 60 Gb it starts erases previously stored data to accommodate the new data. I tried to store 900Gb on one or them and it showed all the directories as expected, but bad or incorrect files were in each of those directory. Data that should have been in one directory showed up over writing the contents of other directories. Some directories were completely corrupted. Tested the two devices I purchased on completely different computers with different data sets and got the same result. Do not trust your data to these devices. The earliest data stored on it will be overwritten with the later data you save. This will completely corrupting your data. Only purchase this device if you want to loose your data.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed added storage for my college student. Great gift for the data transfer she needed from her phone to computer. Easy to use- plug and play Basic solution

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for USB-A, Not useful for USB-C
reviews.reviewText: Good size for the price and it so far works great for USB-A, however, the main reason I bought it was having both USB C and A on the same drive. I haven't found a single device that the USB-C connector works with. Dunno if my devices are just too old to support it or what, but the same devices load the drive up fine if I hook up a USB-A to USB-C adapter, so I know the devices can handle the drive and the files. Thirty bucks is still pretty good for a 1TB flash though, so I can't complain too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I needed
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to get my photos off an older laptop. Little navigating to figure out, but it worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient Piece of Equipment for Commuting Academic Scholars
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this "USB C Flash Drive" with 64GB of memory, and I can confidently confirm that this product has immensely exceeded all my expectations— The overall sleek and durable design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also matches extraordinarily well with my MSI Laptop. The high-speed data transfer capability of USB 3.1 additionally ensures swift and efficient file transfers between my varying devices. I found this product, i.e., the "USB C Flash Drive" to be particularly helpful and handy for expanding the initial storage on my Android phone — as well as for backing up important data from my computer and tablets, e.g., mainly academic related textbooks which usually require a sufficient amount of download space. The compatibility with various devices also makes it a versatile storage solution; the plug-and-play feature this product comes with right out-of-the-box worked seamlessly, and I truly appreciate the convenience this device has offered me. The 64GB storage capacity is impressive, fits all my needs, and provides me with amply enough space for my extensive photo, video, and literature libraries. Overall, this "USB C Flash Drive" has proven to be a reliable and effective external storage option, making it an incredibly valuable tool/addition to my tech accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Consistently unreliable reliable data storage. AVOID!
reviews.reviewText: Saw one other reviewer here talking about this drive getting data corruption while loading data to it. I figured that person maybe got a bad device. I bought 2 of these, and BOTH of them reported data corruption after getting to about 30% full. I reformatted, even did a full, slow format. Didn't help. And I know my data is good because it all wrote out fine on the Crucial 1TB SSD that replaced this garbage. Unfortunately, I can't find the boxes these came in, so waste of moeny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. This thumb drive was a simple plug n play experience and made it easy to not only transfer pictures but also other from to and from a PC. The only problem I encountered (using a Samsung Galaxy) was that I have to tap on a disconnect option before unplugging the USB or else file changes will not occur
